reviewText:
I enjoyed the dvd. It included many N&W steam locos in freight service at the end of the steam era. The narrator (producer) is the son of the photographer which helped in the editing I believe.

I thought a neat bonus was the section where they covered the same areas today. It is amazing how much some of the locations have changed while others remain basically the same.

I wasn't until later in my life, that I learned of such steam giants were built and they never fail to impress me, I can almost feel the earth shake in my family room when I'm watching. I love them!!! What also impressed me was the years in which  they were built...
